title: Token management

milestone.title: 0.15.5 - Stabilizing release
milestone.description:
A point milestone where we focus 100% on bug fixing, stabilisation, reliability and finishing any unfinished items from 0.15  

**1.  Reduce size of community description metadata**
- better compressions, less duplication

**2. Use data sync layer (or other mechanism) to improve community description reliability**
- Every time a new user joins the community, the Control Node updates and signs the description.
- Random back off to stop it being too chatty 

**3. Refactor synchronisation of contacts**
- To fix various contact request issues, is a large work item
- Mishka and Igor to work on this?
- https://github.com/status-im/status-go/issues/3720
- https://github.com/status-im/status-go/issues/3803#issuecomment-1654588500

--- Wallet ---

- Database re-encryption flows
- Community Asset and NFT designs for Asset screens
- Community token visibility
- Minor updates to Asset screens
- WalletConnect

body:
# Token Management

Design: https://www.figma.com/file/FkFClTCYKf83RJWoifWgoX/Wallet-v2?type=design&node-id=17157-437895&mode=design&t=wARKwXaKrKqrzo4D-4

## Contract
- [ ] #12447
- [ ] Link community to erc20 when receiving tx or receiving invite

## Community Mint Tokens
- [ ] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/12365

## Notification
- [ ] Send Notification when user receive a community token
- [ ] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/12366

## Wallet view
- [ ] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/12369
- [ ] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/12372
- [ ] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/12373

## Activity View
- [ ] Displaying the received community tx in the history list (use extended component developed in [task #12375](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/12375))
- [ ] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/12375

## Settings / Manage Tokens
The following UI task must be done before starting with `assets / collectibles or token lists tabs` tasks: 
- [ ] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/12376 

### Assets tab

- [ ] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/12377
- [ ] Assets backend data management (sorting / show / hide). Depends on [task #12377](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/12377)
- [ ] Assets Advance settings backend
- [ ] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/12378

### Collectibles tab
- [ ] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/12379
- [ ] Collectibles backend data management (sorting / show / hide). Depends on [task #12377](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/12377) and probably on [task #12379](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/12379)

### Token List tab
- [ ] #12475
- [ ] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/12374
